title: UOIT Fall Open House
description: This is the perfect opportunity to come and see the campus. Talk to current students, professors and staff. To register visit http://uoit.ca/openhouse

title: Offers of admission start releasing
description: Offers of admission will begin to be released rolling bases as documentation is received.

title: Deadline to submit applications to OUAC for competitive programs
description: Deadline to submit completed applications for competitive programs to the Ontario Universities’ Application Centre (OUAC): Kinesiology – advanced entry – Fitness and Health Promotion, Kinesiology – advanced entry – OTA/PTA, Medical Laboratory Science , Nursing , Nursing (post-RPN). Please note: Applications received after this date will still be processed by OUAC and distributed to the universities. However, specific institutional deadlines will apply.

title: Document submission deadline for competitive programs
description: A midterm mark (for high school courses) or final mark (for college and university courses) must be submitted for each prerequisite course in order to be considered for admission. Competitive programs include: Kinesiology – advanced entry – Fitness and Health Promotion, Kinesiology – advanced entry – OTA/PTA, Medical Laboratory Science , Nursing , Nursing (post-RPN).

title: UOIT Pathways Information Night
description: If you are looking to turn your diploma into a degree, our Pathways Information Night provides you with an opportunity to learn more about your degree options, speak with faculty and staff, and learn more about our academic programs and dynamic student life. For more information and to register, visit http://sites.uoit.ca/pathways/event-calendar.php.

title: UOIT Winter Open House
description: This is the perfect opportunity to come and see the campus! Talk to current students, professors and staff. To register, visit http://uoit.ca/openhouse

title: Deadline to apply for the following scholarships: Chancellor's, President's, Founder's and Global Leadership Award
description: Deadline for Secondary School Students to apply for the following: Chancellor's Scholarship, President's Scholarship, Founder's Scholarship (http://communications.uoit.ca/sample/all-content-types/multi-row-content.phphttp:/safa.uoit.ca/scholarships-and-bursaries/scholarships/index.php#application), and Global Leadership Award (http://safa.uoit.ca/scholarships-and-bursaries/scholarships/scholarships-and-awards-for-international-students.php)

title: Deadline to submit FIRST Robotics Canada Scholarship application
description: Deadline for out-of-province secondary school students and Ontario secondary school graduates to submit FIRST Robotics Canada Scholarship application. More info at http://safa.uoit.ca/scholarships-and-bursaries/scholarships/index.php#first

title: Deadline to submit applications to OUAC for equal consideration
description: Deadline to submit completed applications to the Ontario Universities' Application Centre (OUAC) for equal consideration. Please note: Applications received after this date will still be processed by OUAC and distributed to the universities. However, specific institutional deadlines will apply.

title: Document submission deadline for non-competitive programs
description: Document submission deadline for admissions consideration for non-competitive programs.

title: Deadline to apply for UOIT residence
description: Residence applications must be received by this date to guarantee a spot in residence. Apply at http://uoitrez.ca/

title: Deadline to submit tuition deposit
description: Applicants must first accept their offers through OUAC before they can pay their deposits.
